mapper.insert: insert into shop_addr( user_idx,addr_name, addr_phone, addr_addr) values(#{user_idx}, #{addr_name}, #{addr_phone}, #{addr_addr})
mapper.select: select user_pwd from shop_user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update shop_user set user_pwd = #{user_pwd} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from shop_heart, shop_product order by heart_idx

SELECT * from shop_order o INNER join shop_user u on u.user_idx = o.user_idx INNER join shop_addr a on a.user_idx = a.user_idx AND o.addr_idx = a.addr_idx INNER join shop_product p on p.product_idx = o.product_idx where o.order_idx=#{order_idx}
